item.title: Main Deck Side Cargo Door Latch System (Electrical Function)

numlitem.para: There is no damage to the latch mechanism,
There is no damage to the master latch lock mechanism,
Door is closed and locked using an accepted maintenance manual procedure, and
All latch cams are visually confirmed to be in the closed position.

placard.para: Placard on Main Deck Side Cargo Door control panels: "ELECTRICAL LATCH ACTUATION – INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually check the side cargo door to ensure that there is no damage to the latch mechanism or master latch lock mechanism.
Door may be operated manually or electrically and manually as follows:
Alternatively, door may be operated as follows:

To open door, unlock and unlatch the door manually using the procedures described in Open Door Manually section of AMM 52-32-00. Electric actuation may then be used to unhook and lift the door to complete the door opening sequence.

To close door, operate door electrically until inoperative electric latch actuation halts door operation. Then use manual Close Latches and Lock Door Latches procedures in the Close Door Manually section of AMM 52-32-00 to complete the door closing sequence.
